channel.title: Spittin Chiclets on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in Spittin Chiclets on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 474: Featuring Marc Methot + Fan Calls | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 474 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Marc Methot (01:23:29) to talk about the Ottawa Senators, his media career, and his time playing in the NHL. But first, the guys recap their crazy weekends, Biz and Whit go head to head, as well as all the hockey talk that’s going around the league. Later, the guys take more fan questions (03:18:30). What could have been if the Chiclets boys owned their very own ECHL hockey team, we may never know…or will we.

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 473: Featuring Michael Del Zotto | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 473 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Michael Del Zotto (01:50:00) to talk about his career and life after retirement. But first, the guys talk about the news circling around the NHL with Patrick Kane signing in Detroit, what’s going on in Chicago, and where hitting is going in the league. Are the Yotes a wagon? Would you fight your brother? And what’s grinding RA’s gears this week?

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 472: Featuring Alex Killorn + Fan Calls | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 472 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Alex Killorn (01:36:31) to talk about his new role with the Anaheim Ducks. But first, the guys talk about the breaking news in Minnesota with the firing of Dean Evason as well as the red hot Rangers. The boys also talk about what’s going on around the league, giving their sticks taps to the teams dominating the league.

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 471: Featuring Devon Levi | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 471 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Devon Levi (01:53:42) to talk about his impressive rookie season and his time dominating college hockey. But first, the guys talk to Murls about the NHL’s Global Series in Sweden. The NHL App is a nightmare and will things continue to be going down hill in Edmonton or will they turn things around? Where is Patrick Kane going to sign and will there be new rules coming to overtime?

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 470: Featuring Arron Asham | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 470 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Arron Asham (01:21:47). But before Arron joins, the guys talk about the Woodcroft firing in Edmonton, the New York Forrealzies, and Biz’s only favorite team; the Toronto Maple Leafs. After, the guys talk about what else is going on around the league and find out what’s grinding RA’s gears this week. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 469: Featuring Derek Stepan and Trung Phan | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 469 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Derek Stepan & Trung Phan. Derek joined (01:07:52) to talk quickly about his time with the Rangers and his future plans on wanting to become a GM in the National Hockey League. But before Derek joins, the boys talk about the Ottawa Headline Hogs and the Troubles in Toronto. Trung Phan joined (02:24:54) to talk crypto, the Sam Bankman-Fried trial, movies, and much more!

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 468: Featuring Logan Cooley and Kevin Dallman | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 468 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Logan Cooley & Kevin Dallman. Logan Cooley joined (01:13:02) to talk about his start as a future NHL star. But before Logan joins, the boys have a Halloween Special and talk shop about the problems in Ottawa and the Heritage Classic. Kevin Dallman joined (02:54:54) to talk to the guys about his legendary KHL career, and he didn’t forget the Russian Gas.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 467: Featuring Mick Vukota | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 467 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Mick Vukota. Mick joined (01:56:59) to discuss his legendary career as an NHL enforcer. But before Mick’s hilarious interview, the guys talk about their weekends, the troubles in Edmonton, and what else is going on around the league. The boys also talk about the rumors circling around the NHL Draft and is RA really the worst thing to ever come out of Boston?

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 466: Featuring Kenny Albert | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 466 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Kenny Albert. Kenny joined (01:31:26) to discuss his broadcasting career, to tell some good hockey stories, and one hilarious Mike Bloomberg story. But first, the guys break down the start of the NHL season. Could Auston Matthews score 70 goals? Could Jack Hughes get 150 points? The fellas touch on all that and more. The boys also dive into all the recent NHL news, including Owen Power and Devon Toews new contracts.

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 465: Featuring Pierre-Cedric Labrie | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 465 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Pierre-Cedric Laurie. PCL joined (01:11:14) to discuss his career, Patrick Roy, playing in Tampa and tons more. But first, the guys open up the show talking all things Chiclets Cup. Is it time the Big Deal Selects throw in the towel? What went wrong in Buffalo for Biz and the boys? The fellas then break down the Atlantic Conference and give their predictions on who will and won’t make the playoffs this season.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 464: Featuring Terry Ryan Jr. | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 464 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Terry Ryan Jr. TR joined (01:32:36) to tell some hilarious stories, discuss his role on ‘Shoresy’, and most importantly, the upcoming Chiclets Cup. But first, the guys congratulate Murls on the birth of his first Son and hear about Whit’s crazy Euro-Trip. The fellas also dive into some NHL news before the division preview, including Trevor Zegras and his new deal with the Anaheim Ducks.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 463: Featuring Nico Hischier | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 463 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Nico Hischier. The Devils Captain joined (01:35:17) to discuss growing up in Switzerland, the Devils playoff run, his teammates and more. But first, the guys open the show with some news from Murls. The guys then discuss the recent drama between Steven Stamkos and the Tampa Bay Lightning. The guys wrap up the show with the Metro preview and some golf talk.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 462: Featuring Chris Chelios + Kevin Bieksa | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 462 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Chris Chelios & Kevin Bieksa. Cheli joined (01:17:52) to discuss his recent jersey retirement announcement, playing in Detroit, and lastly Mike Babcock. But first, the guys open the show breaking down their crazy week surrounding the Mike Babcock news that broke on the last podcast. The guys then hear from Kevin Bieksa (01:46:47), who recaps the latest Sandbagger and breaks down the Canucks/Ducks offseason.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 461: Featuring Jon "Nasty" Mirasty | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 461 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Jon ‘Nasty’ Mirasty. Nasty joined (02:14:09) to discuss Shoresy, playing in Russia/KHL, fighting Biz, and tons more. But first, the boys are back! Biz and Whit joined RA, G and Murls after a summer off. Does Biz have a new love interest? Did Whit cry like a baby when his son went to Kindergarten? The guys touch on all that and then dive into all the NHL news from the summer like Karlsson, AM34, and tons more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 460: Featuring Tuukka Rask | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 460 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Tuukka Rask. Rask joined (00:15:44) to discuss his career in Boston, his AHL snapshow, playing with guys like Patrice Bergeron and David Pastrnak and tons more. But first, the guys open the show talking about Murls first daddy-daughter dance class and the most epic Pizza review of all time. The guys wrap up the show with Grinds My Gears and the return of All Right Hamilton.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 459: Featuring Dave Portnoy | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 459 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Dave Portnoy live from Boston. The Founder of Barstool Sports joined (00:24:44) to discuss the Barstool Awards, 20 years of content, his favorite memories and tons more. But first, the guys open the show discussing the Barstool Awards and the Auston Matthews extension. Did the Leafs overpay? The boys break it all down. RA then wraps up the show with a Grinds My Gears and some movie recommendations.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 458: Featuring Owen Power, Matt Beniers and Tyler Toffoli | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On episode 458 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Owen Power, Matt Beniers and Tyler Toffoli. Power and Beniers joined (00:17:43) live in Nashville to discuss playing together at Michigan, their rookie seasons, what they are working on the offseason and tons more. But first, the guys open the show discussing how RA got backstage at Morgan Wallen. The guys are also joined by Tyler Toffoli (01:06:33), who joined the show before his trade to the Devils, to discuss his offseason, his time in LA/Calgary and tons more.

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 457: Featuring Clayton Keller + Hal Gill | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 457 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Clayton Keller and Hal Gill. Clayton joined (00:20:08) us to discuss his crazy come back season after breaking his leg, his thoughts on the mess in Arizona, his golf game and tons more. But first, the guys open the show with RA addressing his absence last week. Was RA really just sleeping? The boys break it down. The guys are then joined by Hal Gill (01:20:55) to preview the Predators upcoming season.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 456: Featuring Tom Fitzgerald | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 456 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the boys are joined by New Jersey Devils GM Tom Fitzgerald. Tom joined (00:52:02) the show to discuss his NHL career, his management career, the Devils bright future and tons more. But first, Colby and Whit open the pod breaking down all things Pittsburgh and Erik Karlsson. Was it the right move for the Penguins? Can they content for a Cup? The boys break it down.

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 455: Featuring Milan Lucic | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 455 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Milan Lucic. Looch joined (00:23:19) to discuss his return to Boston, playing in Calgary, Biz’s bet, and tons more. But first, the guys open the show and catch up with Murls on his summer at Saratoga. The guys also break down the major news that Patrice Bergeron is retiring and the Sebastian Aho contract. Murls wraps up the show with some EuroHockey previews.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 454: Featuring Brian Boucher | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 454 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Brian Boucher. Brian joined (00:22:44) to discuss his goaltending career, his broadcasting career, and tons of funny stories in between. But first, RA opens up the show with his thoughts on Oppenheimer and Grinnelli disucsses his food poisoning story. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 453: Featuring Dan Girardi | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 453 of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Dani Girardi. Dan joined (00:13:39:12) to discuss growing up with Biz in Welland, Ontario, playing in New York, playing in Tampa and tons more. But first, the guys open the show breaking down the Alex DeBrincat trade. RA then wraps up the show with some movie/show recommendations. DeBrincat Trade - 00:07:58:18 INTERVIEW START - 00:13:39:12 Movie Talk - 01:39:21:29 Big Deal Brewing Announcement - 01:53:22:03 Chiclets Cup Announcement - 01:54:07:15

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 452: The Best Of The 2022-2023 Season | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description Biz not washing hands - 00:00:44 RA proms - 00:08:48 Whit forgetting phone in Uber - 00:18:02 Barkley talking hockey/biz/dream team - 00:24:50 Marchessault talking stanley cup/kessel stories - 00:42:37 Forsberg Injury Story - 00:52:00 Shower Sheriff from Game Notes - 01:13:27 Jagr saying Mario was came back because of his son - 01:17:45 Andre Roy Cookies - 01:24:27 Mike Milbury telling the story about his first NHL fight - 01:31:27 Chara going from Junior B to the NHL - 01:43:47 One of Biz’s worst takes ever - 02:06:07

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 451: Featuring Adam Fantilli, Leo Carlsson & Ryan Leonard | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 451 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by top draft picks Adam Fantilli, Leo Carlsson and Ryan Leonard. Adam joined (00:43:11) to discuss his decision to go to Michigan, his father and his brother’s impact on his game, and tons more. But first, the guys recap their crazy week in Nashville. Was RA the drunkest human on planet earth? Did he set up the greatest dinner of all time?

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 450: Featuring Jaromir Jagr | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On episode 450 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by NHL legend Jaromir Jagr. Jags joined (01:01:58) to discuss his playing career, some stories from Pittsburgh and his time with Mario, playing in the KHL and tons more. But first, the guys are in Nashville so they open up the show with some NHL awards talk. The boys also talk all things NHL draft, and some rumors they are hearing about who could go 2nd overall.

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 449: Featuring Stanley Cup Champions Jonathan Marchessault + Zach Whitecloud | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 449 of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Stanley Cup Champions Jonathan Marchessault and Zach Whitecloud. Marchy joined ( 00:58:09) to discuss winning the Cup, the parade, winning the Conn Smythe and tons more. The boys are then joined by Zach Whitecloud (02:09:42) to discuss his role in winning the cup, his heritage, the parade shannigans and tons more. But first, the guys open the show discussing how they all got to party with the Cup in Las Vegas.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 448: Live From The Cup Final with Murls + Army | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 448 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the boys are live from Las Vegas for the Stanley Cup Final. The guys break down all things Vegas-Florida, will discussing their experience in Fort Lauderdale at Game 4. Does Vegas have this all locked up? Is Florida done? Tune in to hear the guys takes. The fellas also break down all the recent NHL news including Shane Doan to the Leafs, Tom Wilson potentially leaving Washington, and tons more.

item.title: Chiclets Game Notes Episode 8: Rainbow Game + Game 3 Recap | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 8 of Chiclets Game Notes, Murls and Colby are back for the last and final pod of the season. Along with a recap of Game 3, the guys play Beer League Heroes, Show or Minzees and all the favorite Game Notes segments. The guys also discuss Murls legendary "Rainbow Game". Chiclets Chirps - 00:13:03 Show or Minezeez - 00:24:34 Beer League Heroes - 00:45:39 Riding the Bus - 00:56:35 Vegas Florida Game 3 - 01:24:46

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 447: Featuring Shane Hnidy + Cup Final Update | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 447 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Shane Hnidy. The Sheriff joined (01:14:37) to discuss his NHL career, his broadcasting career, and the Vegas Golden Knights. But first, the guys open the show with a recap of games 1 and 2 of the Stanley Cup Final between Vegas and Florida. Can Vegas be beat? The guys break it all down. The fellas also dive into all the recent NHL news, including Cole Caufield’s new contract, Mike Babcock returning behind the bench, and Pittsburgh hiring Kyle Dubas.

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 446: Featuring Martin St. Louis + Cup Final Preview | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 446 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Martin St. Louis. The Habs bench boss joined (01:01:14 - 02:12:32) to discuss his legendary playing career, coaching in Montreal, some amazing stories, and tons more. But first, the guys open with a recap of the Eastern and Western Conference Finals followed by a Cup Final Preview. Who will raise Lord Stanley, Vegas or Florida? The guys gave their predictions, x-factors, and tons more.

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 445: Featuring Rick Vaive | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 445 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Rick Vaive. The Leafs legend joined (01:44:37 - 02:41:31) the show to talk about his time in Toronto, losing his captaincy, Brendan Shanahan and tons more. But first, the guys open the show discussing the recent Kyle Dubas news. Are the Leafs better off without him? Are you Team Shanny or Team Dubas? The Boys break it all down before diving into all things playoff hockey.

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 444: Featuring Charles Barkley | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 444 of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Charles Barkley. Chuck joined (01:21:17) to discuss his love for hockey, the dream team, MJ vs LeBron and TONS more. But first, the guys open up the show recapping round 2 of the Playoffs. Is it time for the Oilers to change up the core? Should Toronto fire everybody? The guys also preview Carolina vs Florida, along with Dallas vs Vegas and give their series predictions for the Conference Finals.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 443: Playoffs, Flyers, Suspensions & More | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 443 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Murls to break down all the remaining series. But first, the guys open the show with the recent news of Keith Jones being hired by the Philadelphia Flyers. What will Jonesys first changes be in Philly? The guys broke it down. The boys also discuss the suspensions of Darnell Nurse and Alex Pietrangelo. Was 1 game fair for each?

item.title: Spittin’ Chiclets Episode 442: Bedard to Chicago + Round 2 Playoff Update | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 442 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys give a round 2 playoff update. But first, the guys open the show with the major news that the Chicago Blackhawks have been awarded the first overall pick by the NHL and will have the chance to draft Connor Bedard. The guys then break down Toronto/Florida, Dallas/Seattle, Carolina/NJD and Vegas/Edmonton. Could Seattle sneak past Dallas? Are the Devils done? How good is Leon?

item.title: Chiclets Game Notes Episode 7: Featuring Ryan Whitney | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 7 of Chiclets Game Notes, Matt Murley and Colby Armstrong are joined by Ryan Whitney. Whit joined to break down Leafs/Panthers, Seattle/Dallas, Edmonton/Vegas and Devils/Canes. The boys also dive into the segments Beer League Heroes, Show or Minzees, riding the bus and tons more. And of course, Murls wraps up the show with some picks. 00:42:31 - Show or minzies 01:04:55 - Beer league Heroes 01:19:11- Riding the bus 01:29:21 - Sportsbook section

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 441: Featuring Keith Yandle | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 441 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Keith Yandle. Yands joins for the full episode to help recap all the series from round 1, and give predictions for Round 2. The boys also talk about some recent NHL news, including Darryl Sutter and the Calgary Flames parting ways, along with some intense comments coming out of Winnipeg. Florida Boston: 00;05;50;06 Tampa Leafs: 00;33;37;19 Seattle Colorado: 00;52;13;09 Minnesota Dallas: 01;14;07;18 Rangers Jersey: 01;28;29;12 Edmonton LA: 01;50;59;21 Jets Vegas: 02;07;19;13 Islanders: 02;15;50;14 Quick Picks start: 02;20;20;04 Edmonton Vegas: 02;20;30;15 New Jersey Carolina: 02;26;20;05 Dallas Seattle: 02;31;03;04 Leafs Panthers: 02;35;24;02

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 440: Playoff Update with Murls | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 440 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Murls for a playoff update. But first, the guys open the show addressing Whit’s viral take about adults wearing jerseys. Should grown adults be wearing hockey jerseys? The guys then dive into all the series, including Biz’s Toronto Maple Leafs. Could the Leafs ACTUALLY advance past the first round? Are the Bruins in trouble? Why are the ratings so low in Vegas-Winnipeg?

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 439: Bad Refs, OT Winners & More | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 439 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys talk all things NHL Playoffs. The boys open the podcast by apologizing to all hockey fans for the display of refereeing seen over the past week. Is chirping fans as an NHL GM ok? Has Pasha completely ruined our credibility for his dumb Rangers takes? Should the Devils start Luke Hughes? All that and TONS more on Episode 439. Time codes: 00:09:43 - Tampa-Leafs 00:29:13 - Minnesota-Dallas 00:40:56 - Boston-Florida 00:56:22 - Devils-Rangers 01:06:22 - Islanders-Canes 01:15:44 - Colorado-Seattle 01:22:28 - Winnipeg-Vegas 01:31:10 - Oilers-Kings

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 438: Round 1 Playoffs Update | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 438 of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys talk all things NHL playoffs with familiar face Murls. Why did Minnesota start Fleury? Are the Bruins in trouble? Could Seattle pull off an upset? The boys break it all down. The guys also give their take on the Michael Bunting suspension and wrap up with some $EBR picks. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 437: Featuring Murls, Colby, Gretzky & More | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On episode 437 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are live at Borrellis on Long Island for a playoff preview. But first, the boys recap the big NYPD-FDNY game they broadcasted to barstool.tv this past weekend, Including a Wayne Gretzky interview (00:24:36 - 00:31:58). After the breakdown of the big game, the guys dive right into playoff predictions, with Frankie Borrelli and Pasha stopping by to defend the Devils and Islanders.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 436: Featuring National Champion Rand Pecknold | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 436 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Quinnipiac Bobcats Head Coach and National Champion, Rand Pecknold. Rand joined (01:27:06 - 02:19:30) fresh off capturing his program’s first national championship down in Tampa against Minnesota. The guys broke down his career, how he brought the program to the top of college hockey after starting as a d2 program and tons more. But first, Whit opens the show recapping his weekend at The Masters and the boys talk some NHL.

item.title: Chiclets Game Notes Episode 6: Featuring Ben Barr | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 6 of Chiclets Game Notes, Colby and Murls are joined by UMaine Head Coach Ben Barr LIVE from Tampa at the Frozen Four. The guys discuss Ben and Murls friendship, and how Murls played a huge role in helping Ben get a coaching job. The guys also break down the Frozen Four and give their selections as to who they think will win, along with tons of college hockey talk.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 435: Featuring Sean Hill + NYPD & FDNY Hockey Players | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 435 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Sean Hill and John Perretta + Ryan Dermody. Sean joined (01:19:18- 02:25:11) to discuss his career, tons of funny stories, and what he is up to now. But first, the guys open the show talking about Devon Levi’s first start and discuss whether or not there is there too much pressure on him in Buffalo. Whit, RA and Biz also break down “Sid Rules” after Monty's comments this past week and talk a little Calgary/Florida.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 434: Featuring Dave King | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On episode 434 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Dave King. Kinger joined (01:08:43 - 02:11:06) to discuss his coaching career, coaching Biz, coaching in Russia, and tons more. But first, the guys open the show talking about their weekends and the upcoming events. Are the LA Kings a tough matchup for Connor McDavid and the Edmonton Oilers? The boys broke it all down. The fellas also discuss the future of the Capitals, the Frozen Four, Pasta getting 50 and tons more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 433: Featuring Mike Milbury | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 433 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Mike Milbury. Mike joined (01:19:39:10 - 02:49:09:19) to discuss his playing career, his coaching career, being a TV personality and tons more. But first, the guys open the show discussing the Jordan Bennington and Marc-Andre Fleury drama. Did Jordan cross the line? The fellas also take a look at the West’s playoffs race. Can Colorado repeat? Or will someone new come out of the west?

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 432: Featuring Shjon Podein | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 432 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Shjon Podein. Shjon joined (01:31:08:19 - 02:30:12:10) to discuss his time in Philly, winning the Cup in Colorado, his infamous Stanley Cup story, and tons more. But first, the guys open the show recapping their weekends and breaking down the major news out of Philadelphia. The boys also touch on all the major NHL news, and discuss the possibility of an LA Kings - Vegas Golden Knights 1st round playoff matchup.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 431: Featuring Tage Thompson | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 431 of Spittin’ Chicles, the guys are joined by Buffalo Sabres Superstar Tage Thompson. Tage joined (01:44:53 - 02:22:49) to discuss getting drafted by St. Louis, the big trade, playing in Buffalo with this young core and tons more. But first, the guys open up the show discussing the crazy week in the NHL and break down all the big trades. Should the Kings have dealt Jonathan Quick?

item.title: Chiclets Game Notes Episode 5: Trades, Quebec PeeWee Tournament & More | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On episode 5 of Chiclets Game Notes, the guys break down all the crazy trades happening in the NHL, Beer League Heroes, Show or Minezies, and talk some NCAA. Colby also recaps his time in Quebec at the Quebec peewee hockey tournament. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 430: Featuring Dylan Strome + Fake GM Joe | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 430 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Dylan Strome and Fake GM Joe. Stromer joined (01:18:27 - 01:54:56) for the 2nd time, to discuss his career, the trade to Chicago, signing in Washington and tons more. But first, the guys open with their typical therapy session. The guys also dive into all the recent NHL news, including the huge Timo Meier-New Jersey trade. The boys also break down the power-house eastern conference and all the moves the teams are making.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 429: Featuring Chandler Stephenson + Colby Armstrong | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 429 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Chandler Stephenson live from the NHL All Star Game. The Vegas Golden Knights Forward joined (01:12:02 - 01:42:20) to discuss winning the Cup with Ovi in Washington, playing in Vegas, his early days and tons more. But first, the guys open the podcast breaking down their trip to Raleigh this past weekend for the NHL Stadium Series. The boys also break down all the recent NHL news, including the big Leafs trade.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 428: Featuring Rasmus Dahlin | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Episode 428 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Rasmus Dahlin of the Buffalo Sabres. Dahlin joined (01:07:00) to discuss the up and coming Buffalo Sabres, what he misses from Sweden, and some good stories. item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by former NHLer Jamal Mayers. Jamal joins to talk about his great work in the community with the Chicago Blackhawks, along with some hilarious stories from his career. The guys also talk about all the crazy NHL news, including the Bill Peters incident. The boys wrap up with some lighter talk including a gambling corner from RA. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 221: Featuring Bryan Berard | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former NHL defenseman Bryan Berard. Beast joins to talk about his career, playing for Mike Milbury, losing his vision in one of his eyes and a ton more. The guys also talk some NHL news, including Cale Makar, Ottawa Senators, the Flames and more. Rear Admiral wraps up with some movie talk and a Gambling Corner. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 220: Featuring Scott Darling + Eddie Shack | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by Scott Darling and Eddie Shack. Scott joins to talk about his career, his time in Chicago, the process of finding a place to play in Europe and more. Eddie joins to talk some old-time hockey, about his Stanley Cup wins, his new book and more. The boys also touch on some NHL news including the huge news that Mike Babcock was fired by Toronto.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 219: Featuring Matt Murley | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by the legend himself Matt Murley. Murls joins to talk about his career which had lead him to play all over the world as well as his time playing in the NHL with Whit and Biz. The guys also talk about some recent NHL news including the Matt Calvert situation, the Leafs struggles, a Gambling Corner and a ton more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 218: Featuring Jakub Voracek + Igor Eronko | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are in Philly and are joined by Jakub Voracek of the Flyers. Jakub joins to talk about growing up in the Czech, playing in Philly, and a little music talk as well. The boys are also joined by Igor Eronko who is a hockey reporter based out of Moscow. Igor joins to get to the bottom of the beef between Russia and Spittin' Chiclets and talk some Russian hockey.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 217: Featuring Eddie Olczyk | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by Eddie Olczyk. Edzo joins to talk about his new book, beating cancer, his career, horse racing and a ton more. The boys also talk some NHL news, including the recent NHL Global Series and how much it means to players playing in front of friends and family. The guys wrap up with a Gambling Corner and answer a Chiclets Mailbag.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 216: Featuring Teemu Selanne, Kevin Connolly and Shane O'Brien | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Kevin Connolly, Teemu Selanne, and Shane O'Brien. Cons joins to talk Islanders and his career in Hollywood then he surprised the guys with the other guests. Teemu joins briefly to talk about his time playing with Whit and playing tennis against Roger Federer. Then OB wraps up with an update on his podcasting career and what he is up to now.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 215: Ft Tim Stapleton | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by one of their funniest guests yet, Tim Stapleton. Tim joins to talk about his time in Russia, playing for Mike Keenan, his new company and a ton more. The boys also touch on some NHL news including the red hot Canucks and Islanders. The boys wrap up with Gambling Corner from Rear Admiral who has appeared to have turned things around

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 214: Featuring Kirby Dach + Barstool Chief | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by the 3rd overall pick by the Chicago Blackhawks in the 2019 NHL draft, Kirby Dach. Kirby joins to talk about his first NHL goal, getting grilled at the NHL draft, the city of Chicago and much more. The guys then swing by Barstool Chicago for a sit down interview with die-hard Blackhawks fan, Barstool Chief. The guys talk some NHL news as well and wrap up with a gambling corner from RA, even though his picks haven't been the greatest lately.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 213: Featuring Duncan Keith | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by 3x Stanley Cup Champion, Duncan Keith. Duncan joins to talk about the Blackhawks dynasty, winning gold medals, some funny stories about teammates and more. The boys also recap their trip to Chicago, including the Blackhawks “Shoot The Puck” intermission video. Ryan missed his shot. But was he sabotaged? He discussed on Monday's episode. Rear Ads wraps up with a gambling corner and the guys touch on some NHL news.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 212: Featuring Brent Sopel | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are all in Chicago for a Pink Whitney event and are joined by former Blackhawk and Stanley Cup winner, Brent Sopel. Brent joins to talk about his foundation for dyslexia, his time in Russia and some insane stories. The guys then talk some NHL news, some recent injuries and discuss RA's recent viral moment. The boys wrap up with a gambling corner and a major announcement for Canada.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 211: Featuring Brett Kissel + Scottie Upshall | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by country music star Brett Kissel and longtime friend of the podcast, Scottie Upshall. The Updog joins to talk about his tweet at the Dallas Stars, his PTO with the team and what is next for him in his career. Brett joins to talk about his career as a country music singer, the potential for a pink whitney song, and his love for the Edmonton Oilers.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 210: Featuring Robert Bortuzzo + Joey Vitale | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by Robert “Ya Know” Bortuzzo and Joey Vitale to talk about their crazy summers, winning the cup, saying “Ya Know” and a ton more. The guys also talk some recent NHL news and even discuss a recent suspension in the QMJHL. The boys wrap up with a movie segment and a gambling corner and you may be surprised who has the pick this episode.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 209: Featuring Ben Bishop | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Dallas Stars goalie Ben Bishop. Ben joins to talk about his career, his teammates in Dallas, and Sarah Palin. The guys then talk some NHL news, Phil Kessel, the TD Garden seats and more. Rear Ads wraps up the show with a gambling corner, hoping for his luck to change. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 208: Featuring Elite Army Ranger JB Spisso + Ryan Leslie | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys change it up a bit and are joined by Elite Army Ranger, JB Spisso who has spent some time training NHL players after his career in the United States Military. JB joins to talk about training the Penguins, his time in the Military, and his new book called "Warrior Leadership". The boys are also joined by Ryan Leslie of Sportsnet in Calgary to talk Flames and more importantly, Doughty vs Tkachuk.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 207: Featuring Nicklas Lidstrom | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by Hockey Hall of Famer and Stanley Cup Champion Nicklas Lidstrom. Ryan's childhood idol joins to talk about his legendary career, the Avs/Red Wings rivalry, hockey in Sweden, and much more. The guys also talk about some recent NHL news/signings and break down Sidney Crosby's recent fight. The boys wrap up talking about the Jack Edwards/Roman Polak situation and wearing sunglasses inside.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 206: Featuring Jake DeBrusk | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the NHL is back! The guys bring in the new season with an interview with Boston Bruins forward Jake DeBrusk. The boys also break down the opening night games, some recent NHL news and give an Atlantic Division preview. The guys wrap up with some Whitney vs Riggs golf match talk and Rear Admiral's Gambling Corner. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 205: Featuring Mike Richards | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode, the guys are joined by two-time Stanley Cup winner Mike Richards for a great interview. Mike joins to talk about his time in Philadelphia and the Dry Island, some funny Olympics stories and then obviously the two Stanley Cups he won. The guys the break down some recent NHL news then begin their Pacific Division preview. The guys wrap up with the return of RA's Gambling Corner and with the interesting question, what are the best porn star names in hockey?

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 204: Featuring Lyle Odelein | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Lyle Odelein. Lyle joins to discuss his crazy situation with a cactus that almost cost him his life, his career, playing with Whit and more. The guys also touched on some recent NHL news and signings before previewing the entire Metropolitan Division. Whit also gives an update on his Golf Match vs Riggs. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 203: Featuring Roman Josi | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by the Captain of the Nashville Predators, Roman Josi. Roman joins to discuss what it's like playing in Smashville, Swiss Hockey, wedding stories and more. The boys then do their Central Division preview, breaking down each team and what they expect from them this upcoming season. The fellas wrap up with some funny stories and the topic of calling Auston Matthews “Pablo”.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 202: Featuring Jimmy Hayes | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Jimmy Hayes for a hilarious interview. Jimmy joins to talk about playing at BC and with his brother Kevin, his career, growing up with Whit and more. The guys also break down some recent signings as well as discuss the recent Patrik Laine situation in Winnipeg. The guys wrap up with a tribute along with the talk about a goalie getting crushed in the SJHL.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 201: Featuring Stu Grimson | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets…the boys are back! The guys return to two episodes per week and kick it off with a great interview with Stu Grimson. Stu talks about his career as a fighter, some insane stories, his book and a bunch more. The guys also get some major NHL news and discuss the signings of Mitch Marner, Charlie McAvoy and the few other NHL players who signed this past week.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 200: Featuring Sean Burke (Part 2) | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by Sean Burke for part 2 of his sit down with Biz. They talk about Sean's transition post career, coaching some interesting characters, some stories and a bunch more. The boys talk everything under the sun before the interview, including some recent signings and some NHL news along with the discussion of coaches being mic'd up in the NHL.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 199: Featuring Nate Thompson + Brendan Gallagher | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by a pair of Montreal Canadiens. Nate Thompson joins the fellas to talk about some funny stories from early in his career, then some interesting topics like his religion, meditating and his sobriety. Then the guys are joined by Brendan Gallagher, who discusses his time filming Biz Nasty Does BC, Carey Price, His Dad and more. The guys also touch on some NHL news including some retirements and the current RFA situation in the NHL.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 198: Featuring Ryane Clowe + Terry Ryan Sr. | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys wrap up Newfoundland Week with two more guests from The Rock. Ryane Clowe joins the boys to talk about his time in San Jose, some Jumbo Joe stories and what he's up to now. The boys are then joined by Terry Ryan Sr. to talk all things old time hockey and Newfoundland. The guys touch on some NHL news including Caps forward Evgeny Kuznetsov testing positive for a certain white powdery drug.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 197: Featuring Terry Ryan + Teddy Purcell | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description It's ‘Newfoundland Week' on this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets. The guys are joined by both Terry Ryan and Teddy Purcell, two Newfoundlanders who made it to the NHL and had some crazy stories along the way. Biz talks to Terry live from his legendary basement in the house he grew up in while Teddy calls in to catch the boys up on his summer and who he has been working with.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 196: Featuring Nathan MacKinnon | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Nathan MacKinnon of the Colorado Avalanche. The 23-year-old NHL superstar joins the podcast to talk about training with Sidney Crosby, playing in Colorado, some hilarious stories and a bunch more. The boys also have their Kangaroo Court, where Biz defends himself against Whitney's claim he is a sandbagger to Judge Rear Admiral. The boys wrap up with some golf talk and some NHL news, including the talk of Mitch Marner going to the Islanders.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 195: Featuring Sidney Crosby + Michael Russo | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, some are calling it the biggest episode in podcast history. The boys not only announce their new Pink Lemonade flavored vodka “Pink Whitney by New Amsterdam” they are also joined by Sidney Crosby. Sid joins to talk about playing with both Whit and Biz, scoring the ‘Golden Goal', some hilarious stories and a bunch more. The guys also touch on some NHL news and Ryan provides a hilarious Keith Yandle story.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 194: Featuring Tyson Nash | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On this week's episode, Biz sits down with former NHL player and current member of the Arizona Coyotes Broadcast Team Tyson Nash. The guys talk about transitioning to the media, Tyson's career, Las Vegas stories and more. Whit, RA, and Biz also talk NHL news, Biz walking in on his sister, Kangaroo Court and a ton more. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 193: Featuring Max Talbot | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Max Talbot. Max joins to discuss his career, some stories about playing with Whit and Biz, playing in Russia and a ton more. The guys also talk about the recent James Neal for Milan Lucic trade as well as some other NHL news. The boys also get a story about Ryan starting a casino during his NHL days.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 192: Featuring Sean Burke | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, Biz sits down with former NHL goalie Sean Burke for part one of a two-part interview. Sean joins to discuss his career, tell stories from each of the cities he played in and discuss the infamous Mike Keenan. The guys really are all over the map this week with discussions about Tom Cruise, Baseball Movies, Golf, and Tennis. Whit also tells another story of Keith Yandle pranking MacKenzie Weegar.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 191: Featuring Joffrey Lupul | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Wednesday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are back to one episode a week for the summer but luckily were joined by Joffrey Lupul. The fellas interviewed Lupul in his beautiful mansion on the beach in California and talked about his departure from Toronto, life after hockey, prank wars with Whit and a ton more. The boys also discussed his recent free agent signings, athletes going broke and about their trip to LA.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 190: Featuring Rick Tocchet | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by the Head Coach of the Arizona Coyotes, Rick Tocchet. He joins to discuss his career, coaching, Kessel, and more. The guys also wrap up Free Agency and tell their best 4th of July stories during the return of All Right Hamilton. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 189: Featuring Jeff Marek | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Tuesday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Jeff Marek of Sportsnet to talk all things NHL Free Agency. The guys break down all the major signings and recap all the big trades while also touching on their trip to Halifax and RA's side trip to Montreal. The guys give a sneak peak of some of their content that will drop with Sidney Crosby and Nathan MacKinnon as well.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 188: Featuring Stephen Dixon + Brandon Segal | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Stephen Dixon and Brandon Segal. Dixon joins to talk about what it was like playing with Biz and living with him on the road while Segal joins to tell some stories about playing overseas. The guys touch on some NHL as well, including Brooks Orpik and Roberto Luongo retiring and William Karlsson signing in Las Vegas. The guys also recap on their trip to Newfoundland with Terry Ryan and Terry Ryan Sr.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 187: Featuring Sam Cosentino + Dennis Bonvie | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Sam Cosentino and Dennis Bonvie. Sam joins to break down all things NHL Draft while Dennis joins to tell some stories, update us on his current job and a bunch more. The boys also break down all the NHL news that has happened in the past week including the Subban trade, Marleau trade, Miller trade and more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 186: Featuring Ryan Reaves + St. Louis Blues GM Doug Armstrong | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Blues GM Doug Armstrong and Ryan Reaves who showed up to Biz's hotel room mid recording. The guys discuss the Blues Cup win with Armstrong. They also touch on his career, Cup celebration plans, and who he would pick between Whit or Biz going back to their PTO with the Blues. Ryan Reaves then stops in and joins the podcast to discuss some NHL contracts, the salary cap, his new beer and more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 185: Featuring T.J. Galiardi | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by T.J. Galiardi. T.J. joins to talk about his career, playing with Jumbo Joe, playing in Russia and more. The boys then discuss Grinnell's recent trip to Vegas and Biz being there to cover the NHL awards. The guys go around the league and touch on some NHL news as well as recap the Blues parade, Whit's trip to Pebble and a bunch more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 184: Featuring Alex DeBrincat + The St. Louis Blues Are Stanley Cup Champions | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the St. Louis Blues are Cup Champs and the boys recorded immediately after Game 7 so they give a full breakdown. The boys are also joined by Alex DeBrincat of the Chicago Blackhawks. Alex joins to talk about playing with McDavid in Juniors, his chemistry with Dylan Strome, Patrick Kane stories and more. The boys wrap up with some golf talk and thank the fans for an amazing year.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 183: Featuring Nick Kypreos | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Nick Kypreos of Sportsnet to talk about his career, some hilarious stories and to discuss how he broke into the media industry. The boys also break down the Bruins big win over the Blues in Game 6 and preview Game 7. The guys also discuss the St. Louis Post Dispatch and their major fuck up as well as the Jeff Skinner signing.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 182: Featuring Matt Duchene | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Friday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Matt Duchene. Matt joins to talk about his upcoming free agency, the playoffs, the time he wouldn't take a shot with Whit and a bunch more. The guys also give a full recap of Game 5 and the Blues giant win and preview Game 6 in what could be the last game of the season. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 181: Featuring Darryl Bootland + David Ling | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Tuesday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by both Darryl Bootland and David Ling. Bootland joins to discuss what the hell is going on with the Kelly Cup and to make up for his previous Chiclets appearance. Ling on the other hand, joins the podcast for the first time to discuss his career and some great stories along the way. The boys also break down Games 3 and 4 of the SCF, the Dave Tippett hiring, Kevin Hayes trade and a bunch more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 180: Featuring Mike Rupp | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys record live from Boston and give their postgame reactions to both Games 1 and 2 of the SCF. The boys are also joined by former NHLer and current NHL Network Analyst Mike Rupp. Mike joins to talk Stanley Cup, playing with Biz, fighting Biz and more. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 179: Featuring Joey Vitale | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former NHLer and current color analyst for the St. Louis Blues Joey Vitale. Joey joins to talk all things Stanley Cup Finals, some Sid and Geno stories and the fight that ended his career. The boys also give their Stanley Cup finals predictions and breakdown how they think the series will go. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 178: Featuring Ken Daniels | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by the voice of the Detroit Red Wings, Ken Daniels. Ken joins to talk about his long broadcasting career and all the crazy stories along the way. The guys also wrap up the Western Conference Finals and talk some Sharks as they are saving their Bruins-Blues preview for the next podcast. The boys discuss Cindy, Zdeno Chara, and Whit wraps up with a great Memorial Day tribute.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 177: Featuring John Scott | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former NHL enforcer John Scott. John joins to talk about his all-star game experience, his phil kessel scrap, some funny stories and a ton more. The guys then wrap up the Bruins-Hurricanes series, with the Bruins moving on to the cup, the guys discuss some of the things that attribute to their success. The boys then discuss Sharks-Blues and breakdown games 4 and 5.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 176: Featuring Bates Battaglia | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Bates Battaglia. Bates joins to talk about his career, his hate for Bruce Cassidy, his bar and a bunch more. The boys then move on to the Conference Finals series and are watching the Sharks vs Blues game live when the controversial goal happened. The fellas give their knee jerk reactions on the goal and break down the series and also look at the Bruins vs Hurricanes series.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 175: Featuring Brendan Walsh | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by a Boston legend, Brendan Walsh. Walshy joins to talk about his pro career, his time at BU, his time at Maine and some of the craziest stories we've heard on the podcast. The guys also break down both conference finals series and give their thoughts on some recent NHL news. The boys also touch on Mother's Day and how they spent the day.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 174: Featuring Scottie Upshall | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin; Chiclets the guys are joined by legendary man rocket Scottie Upshall to talk all things Blues and NHL playoffs. The guys also get an update on where Uppie stands on his rehab and if he thinks he'll crack an NHL roster next season. The boys also get to talk to Larry Flowers who helped originate “Gloria” as the Blues win song. The guys also touch on some NHL stuff including recaps of the 2nd round and previews of the Conference Finals along with who they think will win each series.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 173: Featuring Ned Havern | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys hang in Boston to record another show together. The boys are joined by Ned Havern to talk about his recent wedding, growing up with Whitney, playing with Biz and a ton more. The guys give a playoff update too along with some NHL news including Ken Holland agreeing to become the Edmonton Oilers GM. The boys also discuss the recent watch party in Boston and talk about the ups and downs from the night.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 172: Featuring Darren Pang | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are all back together in Boston to discuss playoffs. The boys touch on all the series and the headlines surrounding them including Brad Marchand's punch that all of hockey twitter is talking about. The boys are also joined by Darren Pang to discuss the Blues, his career and some great stories he has had along the way. Whitney has also returned after his iron man podcast streak has come to an end, so the fellas find out what actually happened that led to Whit missing the last podcast.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 171: Featuring Derek Stepan | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by current Arizona Coyotes forward Derek Stepan. Biz did his dirty work before the Stepan interview and texted everyone person in his phone book to get dirt on Stepan, so the interview was a good one. The guys then break down each of the remaining playoff series and also discuss some NHL news including the Calder Trophy finalist, the Hart Trophy finalists and more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 170: Featuring Mike Commodore | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by the insiderrr himself, Mike Commodore. Commie joins us while he is en route to Hawaii where they lost his Golf Clubs, so the guys discuss that along with his best pal Mike Babcock. The boys run through some other series with Commie and get his take on the entire 2019 NHL playoffs. The fellas then preview all the series in the second round and recap the final ones of the first round.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 169: Featuring Byron Dafoe | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former NHL goaltender Byron Dafoe. Byron joins to talk about his time in Boston, playing with Gretzky in LA, playing in Russia and more. The boys also break down the remaining playoff series one by one and discuss who they think will advance. Stevie Y made his return to Detroit this week so the guys broke that down as well along with Grinnelli and Whit's Rough N' Rowdy bet.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 168: Featuring Ryan Lannon | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Ryan Lannon to talk about what it is like playing in Europe, to discuss growing up with Whitney and playing with Biz and Wilkes-Barre. The guys also give a playoff update and break down all the series so far including the shocking upset of the Tampa Bay Lightning. Whit also responds to Marc Savard and Frankie Borrelli as he has been getting attacked from all angles this week.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 167: Featuring Ray Ferraro | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys talk all things NHL playoffs so they are joined by one of the best in the business, Ray Ferraro, to get his take on everything that has been going on. The guys discuss the Kardi-DeBrusk situation, Cale Makar signing in Colorado, Carolina, Tampa-Columbus and a whole bunch more. The guys also get into the Masters and break down how big of a comeback story Tiger Woods has been.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 166: Featuring Brandon Yip | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys wrap up with their playoff previews when they preview the final three series that start on Thursday. The boys are then joined by Brandon Yip to talk about his NHL career, the KHL, what it's like living in China and more. The guys then wrap up with Wednesday night's games plus come they touch on some recent NHL news. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 165: Featuring Darren Dreger | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by NHL Insider Darren Dreger of TSN to discuss all the crazy things going on in the NHL right now. Dregs gives us his take on the Florida Panther Head Coaching situation, why Phil Housley was fired and a bunch more. He also gives us his Stanley Cup pick and talks a little about a future lockout and the possibility of it happening.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 164: Featuring Andy O'Brien | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are all in Boston to record in person. The guys are also joined by Sidney Crosby's personal trainer and Director of Sport Science and Performance for the Pittsburgh Penguins Andy O'Brien. Andy joins to talk about CBD, all the things he is working on with Sid, some hilarious stories about working with the Penguins and a bunch more. The guys also touch on some NHL news, the upcoming playoffs, and the Red Wings and more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 163: Featuring Jon Hamm, Robert Bortuzzo & Larry Flowers | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets we have a jam packed episode. First, we were joined by Roberto Bortuzzo of the St. Louis Blues, along with everyone's good pal Larry Flowers. The boys join to talk about the Blues crazy season, the goal song, and a ton more. The guys are then joined by Hollywood Man Rocket Jon Hamm. Hamm joins to talk about his love for the Blues, his acting career, meeting Rear Admiral on The Town set and some more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 162: Featuring Kerry Fraser | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets for the first time ever, the podcast will feature a former NHL referee and arguably the most decorated of all time in Kerry Fraser. Fraser joins the podcast to discuss his entire career and some of the crazy stories along the way. Including fights with Mario Lemieux, Theo Fleury, the famous 1993 Gretzky-Gilmour incident and a bunch more. The guys also talk about some league news, including the Paul Byron- Mackenzie Weegar fight, the Jon Cooper contract extension and tons more.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 161: Featuring Matthew Barnaby | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former NHL pest Matthew Barnaby. Matthew joins to talk all about his career and some of the guys he played with and he obviously doesn't hold anything back. The guys also discuss Biz in NYC, some NHL news including some impressive Keith Yandle stats, Bob Nicholson's comments about the Oilers, plus a bunch more. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 160: Featuring Rob Scuderi | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by a former teammate of both Paul and Ryan, Rob Scuderi. The guys talk about their time in Pittsburgh together, his career and what Scuds is up to now. The boys also discuss Ryan's trip to Turks and Caicos and a failed scuba attempt with his family. Then boys wrap up with some NHL news and a Gambling Corner from Rear Admiral.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 159: Featuring Steve Parsons + An Exotic Dancer | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Steve Parsons who was apart of the St. Patrick's Day Massacre between the Wilkes-Barre Scranton Penguins and Syracuse Crunch on St. Patrick's Day in 2002. We get some great stories from Steve, what actually happened on that day in 2002, what he is up to now and a ton more. We also get a call from Biz's former lady friend who once had her boyfriend give Biz a death threat.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 158: Featuring Teddy Purcell | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys have their final interview of the West Coast Wagon Tour as they are joined by Teddy Purcell, the man behind the scenes for the whole trip. Instead of just chiming in on the interviews, we get a full interview with Teddy himself to find out what he is up to now, some funny stories and we are also joined by his dog Vedder.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 157: Featuring Keith and Brian Yandle | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by their final all-star on the West Coast Wagon Tour, in Keith Yandle. Lucky for listeners, Keith's brother Brian also joined the podcast as well as Teddy Purcell to tell some stories about growing up with Keith and Ryan and what it was like to play with them. The guys also touch on some league news and some recent suspensions, while also diving into Grinnelli's Spring Break trip and RA's throwback story.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 156: Featuring Connor McDavid, Leon Draisaitl and Matt Cullen | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets we are joined by our final all stars from the West Coast Wagon Tour, but we may have saved the best for last as we are joined by Connor McDavid and Leon Draisaitl of the Edmonton Oilers. The guys also have Chiclets Correspondent Teddy Purcell join the pod for the interview to pull some good stories out of his former teammates. The guys are then joined by Matt Cullen who just played his 1500th game.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 155: Featuring Ryan "Bugsy" Malone + Sean Avery vs Frankie Borrelli | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets we have one of our most interesting episodes ever. Once again, the West Coast Wagon Tour rolls on with Ryan “Bugsy” Malone as the guest. We sat down with Bugsy at the house in LA for a nice long chat about his life, his career and some great stories. The guys are also joined by Frankie Borrelli and Sean Avery to dispute Sean's comments about Islanders fans.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 154: Featuring Brent Burns + Kevin Connolly | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the West Coast Wagon Tour continues with Brent Burns from the San Jose Sharks. Burns joins to talk about his very interesting life, his career, some crazy stories and more. The boys also hear from Kevin Connolly, from the hit series Entourage. Kevin is a die-hard Islanders fan so the boys get his take on the upcoming John Tavares return game. The fellas also go around the league and touch on some league news while also finding a way to mix in the question “how much would it cost for you to eat feces”.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 153: Featuring Henrik Lundqvist + Mike Commodore | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Tuesday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by arguably the best-looking person on the planet, Henrik Lundqvist. The Rangers goalie stops by the West Coast Wagon Tour to discuss how his season has been going, to talk about some of his teammates, his career, his clothes and a ton more. Hank also gives some legendary stories, just as you'd expect. The guys then follow up with an interview with the insiderrr himself, Mike Commodore.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 152: Featuring David Pastrnak + Reid Simpson | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the West Coast Wagon Tour continues with an interview with Boston Bruins forward David Pastrnak. The guys talk about David's upbringing, his new contract with the Bruins, and some insight into the Bruins locker room. The guys are also joined by former brawler Reid Simpson. Reid attended the live show in Chicago so we got his take on that whole situation and his career + some KHL stories.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 151: Featuring Steven Stamkos | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the West Coast Wagon Tour continues as the guys are joined by Steven Stamkos of the Tampa Bay Lightning. Immediately there is tension in the room as Stammer called out Biz for his mental midget comments during his intro and the comedy ensues from there. The guys discuss the Lightnings season, how good Kucherov is and some stories from his day with Teddy Purcell and Bugsy Malone who also joined the interview.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 150: Featuring Claude Giroux | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by their first all-star on the West Coast Wagon Tour, Claude Giroux. The guys talk all things Philly, Carter Hart and even get some good Scott Hartnell stories. The guys then debuted the new voicemail line where fans can call in and leave the boys a message to play on the podcast. The guys wrap up by talking about some things that grind their gears and Valentines Day.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 149: Featuring Scottie Upshall | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Scottie Upshall as a part of the west coast wagon tour. Uppies tells some hilarious stories and gives us an update on what he is up to now and when fans can expect to see him back on the ice. The guys also talk about all the hot teams in the NHL and all the teams that are struggling just as Randy Carlyle is fired by the Ducks.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 148: Featuring Adrian Aucoin | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Adrian Aucoin. The last time the boys heard from Adrian was in Chicago at the failed live show, so we got Adrian's take on that plus a bunch more. The guys also go around the league and touch on some news and trades while also discussing the Blackhawks and Patrick Kane. Can Chicago make the playoffs? Is Kane the greatest US born player ever?

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 147: Featuring Mike Comrie | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Tuesday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys first address the schedule change and why they are recording a day late and its for the obvious reason…the Super Bowl. And once again, the Boston boys gloat in their glory as the Patriots are Super Bowl champions once again. The guys discuss the game and some crazy bets RA hit. The guys are then joined by Mike Comrie, who was apart of the West Coast Wagon Tour.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 146: Featuring Kendall Coyne Schofield + Dustin Penner | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by maybe the most popular person on hockey twitter right now, Kendall Coyne Schofield who took the NHL Skills Competition by storm this past weekend. She joined to talk about all the accomplishments in her career, woman's hockey, paying Brianna Decker and more. The guys were also joined by Dustin Penner to talk about everything under the sun. The guys get some good stories from their playing days with a lot of Edmonton talk.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 145: Featuring Ray Bourque, Teddy Purcell & Ryan Malone | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, Bugsy Malone and Teddy Purcell are back to recap the West Coast Wagon Tour. The guys talk about their favorite moments from the trip, the highlights, lowlights, and some great stories. The guys are then joined by Stanley Cup Champion Ray Bourque to discuss his Hall of Fame career, his time in Boston, his time in Colorado and a ton more. The guys wrap up with RA's gambling corner and a few great stories from the boys playing days and their trip.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 144: Featuring Ryan Malone and Teddy Purcell | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Ryan Malone and Teddy Purcell on their RV trip from LA to San Jose for the All Star Game. As the guys drive up the Pacific Coast Highway, they discuss everything from the Oilers firing Peter Chiarelli to stories from their days playing together. Tune in for one of our best podcast yet. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 143: Featuring Alex Killorn, Jason Demers and Kent Huskins | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Mondays episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Alex Killorn of the Tampa Bay Lightning. The guys discuss Alex's career, some stories about his teammates and much more. The boys were also joined by Jason Demers and his good buddy Kent Huskins to talk some NHL, Kent's coffee shop, some good stories and a bunch more. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 142: Featuring Brantt Myhres + Sheldon Souray | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by former NHLer Brantt Myhres. Brantt joins to talk about his career, his sobriety, and his role now with the LA kings where he is helping out younger players with substance and alcohol abuse issues. The guys then get a call from former guest Sheldon Souray, who is a good buddy of Brantts. The guys tell some good stories and tell a few more good tales.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 141: Featuring Kevin Hayes | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Kevin Hayes of the New York Rangers to check in on how his season is going. Haysie and the boys tell some stories and catch up on some things since the last time he joined the podcast, including some great stories about the infamous Keith Yandle. The guys also touch on some NHL news and how Rear Admiral is having the best week of his life.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 140: Featuring Theo Fleury, Cal Petersen and Matt Luff | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys have two great interviews on tap. The boys are joined by Theo Fleury to talk about his career, his sobriety, some great stories and a ton more. The guys are also joined by a few of the LA Kings young guys (Cal Petersen, Matt Luff) to talk about dating apps in Los Angeles. The guys also go around the league and talk about some NHL news and discuss what the Sabres should do about Jeff Skinner.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 139: Featuring Nate Schmidt, Marc-Andre Fleury and Ryan Reaves | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined in studio by Nate Schmidt, Marc-Andre Fleury and Ryan Reaves of the Vegas Golden Knights. The guys talk about what it is like to play in Vegas, who is the clown on the team, some off the ice stories and a ton more. The guys also touch on some NHL news along with the World Juniors as well. Being that we are half way through the NHL season, the boys give their surprises and disappointments of the season thus far.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 138: Featuring Darren McCarty | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's podcast, the guys explain what happened on their trip to Chicago. The guys discuss why the Live Show didn't go as planned and how the tailgate and the game was. The guys are also joined by 4x Stanley Cup winner Darren McCarty to discuss Music, his time in Detroit, cannabis and more. The boys wrap up by touching on some league news, including Dallas Stars CEO going after Tyler Seguin and Jamie Benn to the press.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 137: Best Of 2018 | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Monday's podcast we have a special “Best Of 2018” edition of the podcast including some of our favorite interviews of the year. Teddy Purcell 6:00 – 45:50 Keith Yandle + Kevin Hayes 48:30 – 1:59:00 Adam Oates 2:01:00 – 2:50:00 Shane O'Brien 2:52:00 – 3:21:00 Jeremy Roenick 3:22:00 – 3:33:00 Auston Matthews 3:34:00 – 4:16:00 You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 136: Featuring Dennis Bonvie, Darryl Bootland and Jamie Rivers | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On a Holiday Episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are giving the listeners an extra long episode to get them through the holidays and are joined by three guests. Jamie Rivers, Darryl Bootland and Dennis Bonvie all join to show to talk about their careers and tell some great stories along the way. The guys also talk about the holidays, World Juniors, some NHL news, and if OHL players should be paid.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 135: Featuring Cam Janssen | Spittin Chiclets
item.description: Podcast Description On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by former NHL enforcer and current talk show host Cam Janssen. Cam joins to talk about some funny stories, his role as an enforcer, some ups and downs in his life and a ton more. The guys also touch on Tom Wilson's big TKO, Biz getting snubbed by Call Her Daddy, Carter Hart and more. You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube.

item.title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 134: Featuring Tyler Seguin | Spittin Chiclets
